title: PEP-6 Node Pilot: A new node deployment solution
body:
Support the development of Node Pilot, Pocket's first Docker deployment tool that is actively being used by users of all technical levels. Node Pilot is free for everyone and has been self-funded by two Pocket community members.

There are too many features to list, so check out the full proposal here: https://forum.pokt.network/t/pep-6-node-pilot-a-new-node-deployment-solution/940

Community feedback has been only positive thus far and new updates are regularly being pushed out.

Do we want to support PEP-6?
author: 0x029d1A8812448d448D446f578ea673eC68a30451
